long_description: The organic cotton Patagonia Kamala Skirt converts to a halter dress for 2-in-1 versatility. The shirred waist becomes a bandeau-style bodice, and the asymmetrical hem swings freely in both forms. Lightweight fabric is a blend of 55% organic cotton and 45% Tencel(R) lyocell. Asymmetrical hem falls below the knee as a skirt. Wide cinched waistband fits snugly and is adjustable on right side with ties. When converted to a bandeau-style dress, the doubled waistband becomes the bodice, and the ties secure behind the neck. With 2 wearing options, the Patagonia Kamala Skirt is ideal for travel.
